request.description:
**Endpoint**: GET /Location_address

**Description**: Returns ListCities

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/location-address/countries/{country_id}/cities

**Method**: GET

**Parameters (Params)**

country_id (Int32, Mandatory)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/location-address/countries/100/cities' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTU0IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjo1MDAwNiwiQURfUm9sZV9JRCI6MTAyLCJBRF9Vc2VyX0lEIjoxMDAsIk1fV2FyZWhvdXNlX0lEIjowLCJBRF9MYW5ndWFnZSI6ImVzX01YIiwiaWF0IjoxNzEwNzE1NzAxLCJleHAiOjE3MTA4MDIxMDF9.sdizIymo1Yd8P8w4D4ORu2EfavUfgxsPPfQIJMNJQQ8'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "record_count": "1",
    "cities": [
        {
            "id": 100,
            "name": "Monroe"
        }
    ],
    "next_page_token": ""
}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- the country id is not registered
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "País * No encontrado *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document |

**Endpoint**: GET /Location_address

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/location-address/countries' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTU0IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjo1MDAwNiwiQURfUm9sZV9JRCI6MTAyLCJBRF9Vc2VyX0lEIjoxMDAsIk1fV2FyZWhvdXNlX0lEIjowLCJBRF9MYW5ndWFnZSI6ImVzX01YIiwiaWF0IjoxNzEwNzE1NzAxLCJleHAiOjE3MTA4MDIxMDF9.sdizIymo1Yd8P8w4D4ORu2EfavUfgxsPPfQIJMNJQQ8'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
 {
            "id": 110,
            "name": "Afganistán"
        },

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document |

response.name: ListCountries

request.description:
**Endpoint**: GET /Location_address

**Description**: Returns ListRegions

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/location-address/countries/{country_id}/regions

**Method**: GET

**Parameters (Params)**

country_id (Int32, Mandatory)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/location-address/countries/100/regions' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTU0IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjo1MDAwNiwiQURfUm9sZV9JRCI6MTAyLCJBRF9Vc2VyX0lEIjoxMDAsIk1fV2FyZWhvdXNlX0lEIjowLCJBRF9MYW5ndWFnZSI6ImVzX01YIiwiaWF0IjoxNzEwNzE1NzAxLCJleHAiOjE3MTA4MDIxMDF9.sdizIymo1Yd8P8w4D4ORu2EfavUfgxsPPfQIJMNJQQ8'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
 {
            "id": 118,
            "name": "AK"
        }

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- the country id is not registered
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "País * No encontrado *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document |

**Endpoint**: GET /Location_address

**Description**: Returns Address

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/location-address/addresses/{id}

**Method**: GET

**Parameters (Params)**

id (Int32, Mandatory)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/location-address/addresses/120' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTU0IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjo1MDAwNiwiQURfUm9sZV9JRCI6MTAyLCJBRF9Vc2VyX0lEIjoxMDAsIk1fV2FyZWhvdXNlX0lEIjowLCJBRF9MYW5ndWFnZSI6ImVzX01YIiwiaWF0IjoxNzEwNzE1NzAxLCJleHAiOjE3MTA4MDIxMDF9.sdizIymo1Yd8P8w4D4ORu2EfavUfgxsPPfQIJMNJQQ8'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "id": 120,
    "uuid": "aa33c84c-cafe-4cb3-b4bc-5d67d27e2965",
    "display_value": "123 Oak St, Hartford, CT 04460",
    "country_id": 100,
    "country_name": "United States",
    "region_id": 102,
    "region_name": "CT",
    "city_id": 0,
    "city_name": "",
    "city": "Hartford",
    "address1": "123 Oak St",
    "address2": "",
    "address3": "",
    "address4": "",
    "postal_code": "04460",
    "postal_code_additional": "",
    "latitude": "",
    "longitude": "",
    "altitude": "",
    "reference": ""
}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- the id does not correspond to any of the records
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Localización / Dirección * No encontrado *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document |

request.description:
**Endpoint**: POST /Location_address

**Description**: Returns Address

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/location-address/addresses

**Method**: POST

**Parameters (Body)**

country_id (Int32, Mandatory)

region_id (Int32, optional)

city_id (Int32, optional)

city (String, optional)

address1 (String, optional)

address2 (String, optional)

address3 (String, optional)

address4 (String, optional)

postal_code (String, optional)

posal_code_additional (String, optional)

latitude (String,optional)

longitude (String,optional)

altitude (String,optional)

reference (String,optional)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/location-address/addresses' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTU0IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjo1MDAwNiwiQURfUm9sZV9JRCI6MTAyLCJBRF9Vc2VyX0lEIjoxMDAsIk1fV2FyZWhvdXNlX0lEIjowLCJBRF9MYW5ndWFnZSI6ImVzX01YIiwiaWF0IjoxNzEwNzE1NzAxLCJleHAiOjE3MTA4MDIxMDF9.sdizIymo1Yd8P8w4D4ORu2EfavUfgxsPPfQIJMNJQQ8' \
--data '{
    "country_id" : 1,
    "region_id" : 2,
    "city_id" : 100,
    "city" : "Monroe",
    "address1" : "valencia",
    "address2" : "paez",
    "address3" : "ciudad",
    "address4" : "acarigua",
    "postal_code" : "3301",
    "posal_code_additional" : "3301",
    "latitude" : "21",
    "longitude" : "21",
    "altitude" : "20",
    "reference" : "1234"
}'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "id": 1000002,
    "uuid": "779c9a7c-55fd-4084-830f-436bc704a18d",
    "display_value": ", , OR ",
    "country_id": 100,
    "country_name": "United States",
    "region_id": 0,
    "region_name": "",
    "city_id": 0,
    "city_name": "",
    "city": "",
    "address1": "",
    "address2": "",
    "address3": "",
    "address4": "",
    "postal_code": "",
    "postal_code_additional": "",
    "latitude": "",
    "longitude": "",
    "altitude": "",
    "reference": ""
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document |

request.description:
**Endpoint**: PATCH /Location_address

**Description**: Returns Address

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/location-address/addresses/{id}

**Method**: PATCH

**Parameters (Params)**

id (Int32, Mandatory)

**Parameters (Body)**

country_id (Int32, optional)

region_id (Int32, optional)

city_id (Int32, optional)

city (String, optional)

address1 (String, optional)

address2 (String, optional)

address3 (String, optional)

address4 (String, optional)

postal_code (String, optional)

posal_code_additional (String, optional)

latitude (String,optional)

longitude (String,optional)

altitude (String,optional)

reference (String,optional)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location --request PATCH 'http://api.adempiere.io/location-address/addresses/1000004' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTU0IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjo1MDAwNiwiQURfUm9sZV9JRCI6MTAyLCJBRF9Vc2VyX0lEIjoxMDAsIk1fV2FyZWhvdXNlX0lEIjowLCJBRF9MYW5ndWFnZSI6ImVzX01YIiwiaWF0IjoxNzEwNzE1NzAxLCJleHAiOjE3MTA4MDIxMDF9.sdizIymo1Yd8P8w4D4ORu2EfavUfgxsPPfQIJMNJQQ8' \
--data '{
    "country_id" : 1,
    "region_id" : 2,
    "city_id" : 100,
    "city" : "Monroe",
    "address1" : "valencia",
    "address2" : "paez",
    "address3" : "ciudad",
    "address4" : "acarigua",
    "postal_code" : "3301",
    "posal_code_additional" : "3301",
    "latitude" : "21",
    "longitude" : "21",
    "altitude" : "20",
    "reference" : "12345"
}'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "id": 1000004,
    "uuid": "d3fbd85a-f7ac-4020-b1f3-af59e3dbebd3",
    "display_value": "valencia, paez, ciudad, valencia, Monroe, OR 3301",
    "country_id": 100,
    "country_name": "United States",
    "region_id": 0,
    "region_name": "",
    "city_id": 100,
    "city_name": "Monroe",
    "city": "Monroe",
    "address1": "valencia",
    "address2": "paez",
    "address3": "ciudad",
    "address4": "valencia",
    "postal_code": "3301",
    "postal_code_additional": "3301",
    "latitude": "",
    "longitude": "",
    "altitude": "",
    "reference": ""
}

 ```

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document |

request.description:
**Endpoint**: GET /Location_address

**Description**: Returns Address

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/location-address/countries/{id}

**Method**: GET

**Parameters (Params)**

country_id (Int32, Mandatory)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/location-address/countries/110' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTU0IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjo1MDAwNiwiQURfUm9sZV9JRCI6MTAyLCJBRF9Vc2VyX0lEIjoxMDAsIk1fV2FyZWhvdXNlX0lEIjowLCJBRF9MYW5ndWFnZSI6ImVzX01YIiwiaWF0IjoxNzEwNzE1NzAxLCJleHAiOjE3MTA4MDIxMDF9.sdizIymo1Yd8P8w4D4ORu2EfavUfgxsPPfQIJMNJQQ8'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "id": 110,
    "uuid": "a5654476-fb40-11e8-a479-7a0060f0aa01",
    "country_code": "AF",
    "name": "Afghanistan",
    "is_has_region": false,
    "region_name": "",
    "display_sequence": "@C@,  @P@",
    "is_address_lines_reverse": false,
    "capture_sequence": "@A1@ @A2@ @A3@ @A4@ @C@,  @P@ @CO@",
    "display_sequence_local": "@C@,  @P@",
    "is_address_lines_local_reverse": false,
    "expression_postal_code": "",
    "is_has_postal_code_additional": false,
    "expression_postal_code_additional": "",
    "is_allow_cities_out_of_list": true
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document |

**Endpoint**: GET /Location_address

**Parameters (Params)**

country_code (String, Mandatory)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/location-address/countries/code/AF' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTU0IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjo1MDAwNiwiQURfUm9sZV9JRCI6MTAyLCJBRF9Vc2VyX0lEIjoxMDAsIk1fV2FyZWhvdXNlX0lEIjowLCJBRF9MYW5ndWFnZSI6ImVzX01YIiwiaWF0IjoxNzEwNzE1NzAxLCJleHAiOjE3MTA4MDIxMDF9.sdizIymo1Yd8P8w4D4ORu2EfavUfgxsPPfQIJMNJQQ8'
 ```

``` json
{

}

 ```
